name: Disguise Self
description: You make yourself--including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person--look different until the spell ends. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear heavier or lighter, but must keep the same basic limb arrangement. The illusion fails on physical inspection. A creature can use the Study action to inspect your appearance and must succeed on an Intelligence (Investigation) check against your spell save DC to discern the disguise.

effects.description: Alter your appearance and gear within size limits; physical contact passes through, and an Intelligence (Investigation) check via the Study action can reveal the illusion.
